title: iboss - Real-Time Threat Log Analytics
description: This dashboards offers insights into threat counts, affected assets and users, threat types, and geographical sources and destinations using logs.

definition.content:
This dashboards offers insights into threat counts, affected assets and users, threat types, and geographical sources and destinations using logs.

For more information, see the [iboss Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/iboss/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

**Note**
- This dashboard is populated using iboss logs forwarded via a [Datadog Agent](https://docs.datadoghq.com/agent).
- Please follow the **Installation** and **Configuration** steps [here](/integrations/iboss) to enable log collection.

search.query: source:iboss @logSubType:(MALWARE_SOURCE OR MALWARE_CONTENT OR DLP OR INFECTION OR PHISHING) $action $sub_type $domain $user $computer_name $asset_id $location $source_country $destination_country $source_ip $destination_ip $host
